p: Many TCM could be used as alternative preventive treatments for COVID-19 based on previous prevention studies in populations at high risk from SARS and H1N1 influenza. 107 The use of TCM to prevent infectious disease epidemics has also been described in the ancient Chinese medicine text, Huangdi Neijing, which was compiled over 2000 years ago. The main principles of TCM are to tonify qi to protect from external pathogens, disperse wind and discharge heat, and resolve dampness. Prospective studies are needed to verify the efficacy and safety of TCM for the prevention of COVID-19. 107
